title: If You Go Crazy, Dance Until You Die

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Huff, huff, huff… That's exactly 20 dashes. 
Anything else on the menu?
choice_data_list: Ah, good job. That was perfect.
Ah, good job. That was perfect.

text_block_list.text:
Summer camp has started and everything's been going well 
since day one. That's not a problem, but…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Haha, you're real bad at bluffing, aren't you?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Keheh… follow me.
Nakayama Festa led me deep into the forest.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
We're going the right way. We just gotta keep 
walking straight through this forest.
choice_data_list: Uh, can you tell me where we're going?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…A sandy beach that's just ahead. I've heard 
the view's wild there. Apparently, this forest is 
why the locals steer clear of it.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
The stakes are "ourselves" and the payout is "the best view". 
Who know's how this'll turn out?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Let's play a game against this forest.

A long abandoned forest. The ominously overgrown vegetation 
makes it impossible to see what's ahead. It's clearly dangerous. 
I should try to stop her. And yet ——

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Keheh… there's only half of suspension bridge left…!
(Snap!!)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hahaha! Lucky you didn't fall through the deck, huh?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Tch, a dead end. Guess that means we'll 
need to go back and around the cliff…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hahaha, good good. You're getting the hang of this, aren't you?

As we continued walking, night fell. In the darkness not even 
the moonlight could reach, the distant murmurs of wild animals 
echoed from every direction.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Hey, look at this tree trunk. Are these bear claw marks? 
They seem like the real deal.

…What am I saying? But even though it was true, I'm still 
putting myself in danger with her regardle——
(Grrrrr…)

In the distance I could hear a low rumbling and the 
sound of grass and trees scraping against each other. 
Something was lowly approaching us.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…Hah. We should probably get out of here. 
Don't want your luck to run out, right?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha… ah, yeah. That's right. 
At a time like this, your only choice is to go all-in!
(Grrroooooaaarrr!!)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Here it comes! Run!!

I'm running in the dark. I can't see anything. 
It's reckless, foolish, and high-risk gamble. 
And yet, that's exactly why ——

We're running. We need to escape. The breaths of the beast are 
rough, its footsteps sound like earthquakes. I feel it looming. 
My brain is on fire, death is close, I feel like I'm burning up ——
choice_data_list: (…Ah. This is it. This is the feeling…!)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Kahahaha! Hey, you, this is crazy! 
It's really crazy!! C'mon, let's go!

Suddenly I felt a strong pull, and the world flipped upside down. 
Nakayama Festa was holding me in her arms.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Here we go!! It's ON!!! Catch us if you can!!!!

Nakayama Festa kept running. At some point, when the beast's 
presence was long gone, the darkness abruptly vanished.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff, huff, huff… I-it's the sandy beach…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Huff… huff… dammit… fat bastard…. chasing after me… huff… outta nowhere… I wasn't gonna let you win…
choice_data_list: That was a hell of a gamble!

text_block_list.text: (Thud)

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaha!! You're not wrong…!! Hahahaha…!

Both of us fell down on the sand and cackled like 
idiots for a while. It was so funny my hands started 
shaking, and then it occurred to me ——
choice_data_list:
(It's that feeling. The same one I had 
on my way home that day…)

text_block_list.text:
When my expression reflected in the display window, 
I saw a smile overflowing with satisfaction and euphoria.

The unexplainable feeling that made my limbs tremble, 
both then and now… it wasn't fear. I'm not scared ——

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Haha… Hey, hey, you just realized? 
Slow on the uptake, aren't you!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
I'm going to get you even more excited. 
Look at what's right in front of you.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: We hit the jackpot, huh?

The moon burns a path of cool light across the lapping 
black waves. A dazzling galaxy lies overhead.

The most glorious rewards come from a battle in which 
you put your life on the line. Exhilaration and gratification 
begin flooding into me… and my body trembling in that 
sensation makes me feel alive.

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
…Keheh… You look tired. Got ahead of 
yourself and burnt out, have you?
choice_data_list: Hey… what should we bet on next?
Hey… what should we bet on next?

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: Hahaha…

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
You're far from scared, just eager to get going. 
Alright, then ——

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: …Come with me.

I gave her a silent nod. We'll carry on. Until we collapse, 
break, and fade out. All along experiencing limitless anxiety and 
enough excitement to get the hairs raising on my body.
